## Ask for help

* ask any member of NIU 
* Use the `OSW-2025` channel on Zulip
* work together
* let Adam know if you don't want to appear in photos

## Join the socials
* Monday: walk to Primrose Hill
* Tuesday: Celtic folk music in King's Cross
* Wednesday: pub quiz at SWC
* Thursday: AlgoChill in Farringdon ([sign up](https://lu.ma/3z1ureee))

Feel free to self-organise using the "Social" topic on Zulip!
